r.d: This extension uses libgearman library to provide API for communicating with gearmand, and writing clients and workers.
r.n: - Fixed memory leak in $task object - Regened constants off of libgearman v0.7 - Removed gearman_task_take_data - Added exception to task job object when created without a geaman obj arg - Fixed a bunch of places where it was possible to use objects before verifying them - Other small bug fixes
